hadiths.text: Ubida b. Samit reported that when wahi descended upon Allah's Apostle (ﷺ), he lowered his head and so lowered his Companions their heads, and when (this state) was over, he raised his head

chapter.ara-name: باب عَرَقِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْبَرْدِ وَحِينَ يَأْتِيهِ الْوَحْىُ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) Sweated When It Was Cold, And When The Revelation Came To Him
